text.Prompt:
Given a item specification and item features, this program will generate exciting product descriptions.

Item specification:
Gund 4048378 Dakota Horse Stuffed Animal Plush

Item features:
Dakota the horse, pink gingham saddle, fuzzy tan mane and tail, gingham flower bridle accent, adorable smile
Embroidered horseshoes on the hooves add chic, realistic detail
Rootin Tootin Cowgirl collection celebrates the spirit of the west
Surface-washable; ages 1+
11 inch length (28 cm)
High quality, huggable, loyal pals for years to come. 
GUND has been a premier plush company for over 100 years; award-winning, beloved plush designs; appeals to next generation
Premium materials, unparalleled softness and huggability

Product description:
text.Response A: Dakota the Horse is a delightful addition to GUND's Rootin Tootin Cowgirl collection! Dakota sports a pink gingham saddle, fuzzy tan mane and tail, and a gingham flower bridle accent. Embroidered horseshoes on the hooves add chic, realistic detail. This adorable plush horse features a huggable body and a lovely smile that's sure to make you smile, too! Surface-washable. Ideal for ages 1+. 11" length.
text.Response B: Dakota the horse is a fun and adventurous companion for any child. Her pink gingham saddle and fuzzy tan mane and tail are a charming and unique addition to her overall appearance. Her adorable smile and embroidered horseshoes on her hooves add chic, realistic detail. Dakota is part of the Gund Rootin Tootin Cowgirl collection, which celebrates the spirit of the west. This adorable stuffed animal plush is surface washable and measures 11 inches in length, making her the perfect size for cuddling. With her soft, huggable material, Dakota is sure to become a loyal pal for years to come.
